IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
splits
ali
is split
, je razdeljeno na dva ali več delov, ali se v tistem pokaže razpoka ali raztrganina.

seg.quote: Three people died when their car split in two after hitting a tree.
It was a very poor quality wood which had already split in many places.

sense.def:
A split
je dolga razpoka ali raztrganina.

seg.quote: There's a split down the page of the atlas.

sense.def:
Kadar neka organizacija
splits
ali
is split
, se skupina njenih članov nikakor ne strinja s preostalimi člani.

seg.quote: The council split down the middle over the issue.
The government is split on how to deal with the situation.

sense.def:
A split
je nesporazum med člani neke organizacije.

seg.quote: The last thing he wanted was a split in the party.

sense.def:
A split
je delitev ali razlika med dvema stvarema.

seg.quote: ...the split between reality and the perception of it.

sense.def:
Kadar dve ali več oseb
split something
, si nekaj razdelijo med seboj.

seg.quote: The profits are to be split fifty-fifty between the two of them.

sense.def:
Kadar dve osebi
split up
, se njuno razmerje ali zakonska zveza konča.

cit.quote: ločiti se, raziti se; razvezati se

seg.quote: After he split up with his wife he went to Arizona.

sense.def:
Kadar neka skupina oseb
split up
, se posamezniki razidejo v različne smeri.

seg.quote: In Hamburg the girls split up.

sense.def:
To split something up
pomeni nekaj razdeliti na več ločenih delov.

seg.quote: You achieve more by splitting them up into groups.
